adrFormatAddress: 787 11th Ave 7th Fl, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: There aren't enough words to express the gratitude I have for Dr. Cho and his entire team. A few months ago I was in dire pain and wasn't sure if I'd be able to walk normally ever again. Just doing basic things like taking a shower and getting dressed were agonizing experiences, to say the least. I went to Dr. Cho and he explained to me the severity of my lower back problems, which were causing the excruciating pain I was in. I felt very comfortable with his diagnosis and did not hesitate to move forward and have surgery. It's been 7 weeks post- surgery and I can say I'm pain-free and able to walk normal again. Thank you Dr. Cho for giving me my life back!

originalText.text: Dr. Samuel Cho, Dr. Mark Henry, and the rest of his team were absolutely fantastic! It was my first surgery, let alone a spinal one, and the team relieved a lot of my worries. I’m happy to say I’ve regained a lot of function in both legs/lower back since the surgery besides the PT that followed. Very genuine and really kind. I felt supported and cared for throughout my experience. The whole ortho spine surgical team at Mount Sinai West were very friendly, especially Nurse Esther! I’m really glad I came out with a great experience; it’s rare to find such.

originalText.text: Thank God for Dr.Cho’s gift and bedside manner. My significant other was suffering in pain / borderline cripple when he went  for a consultation with Dr.Cho. Dr. Cho is thorough , honest and trustworthy. Back surgery is not an easy decision for most but we are forever grateful to  Dr. Cho and  his team. The surgery was successful and life changing. My guy now has the light of life back in his eyes and he is smiling again.

originalText.text: I met Dr. Cho last year when dealing with severe pain in my lumbar spine.   Dr. Cho left my mind at ease after the first appointment I had with him and assured me that his very detailed surgical plan would be of a great help.   He is clearly an expert in his field and his passion for his speciality is evident.   Dr. Cho's bedside manner is incredible too.  He was even kind enough to say hello to my two young children via Facetime while I was in the hospital post-surgery and reminded them that he took good care of me!  I am immeasurably grateful for Dr. Cho and would easily recommend him to anyone who sadly deals with spinal problems.

originalText.text: Dr. Cho and his assistant Mark were courteous and explained in clear detail the different treatments available for my condition. Dr. Cho listened all my concerns and took time to provide additional information I requested. Excellent experience.
